name: AdGuard Home (HOST)
description: Use if you're going to use Adguard Home as a DHCP server. AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking. After you set it up, it'll cover all your home devices, and you won't need any client-side software for that. Learn more on our official Github repository.
longDescription: Use if you're going to use Adguard Home as a DHCP server. AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking. After you set it up, it'll cover all your home devices, and you won't need any client-side software for that. Learn more on our official Github repository.
